code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:28 year old white male management consultant describes recurrent moderate abdominal pain over the past month. The pt reports Stomach. denies any smoking ocas ETOH on w/e o:Height 67 in, Weight 188 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 18, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

td.content: s:white male aged 28 ys c/o 4 weeks h/o moderate abdominal pain (not checked). NKDA. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life occasional EtOH o:Height 66 in, Weight 182 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Endoscopic therapy reduction - stomach.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

td.content: s:patient presents with 2 years history of moderate abdominal pain. patient is a 30 YO male. o:Height 67 in, Weight 186 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed omeprazole - 20 mg IV daily (4-8 week treatment), and ordered Reticulocyte Count.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination
